name: Solidity's most common security pitfalls (and its best safeguards)
description: There are many common smart contract vulnerabilities that are found in audits or in hacks in the wild. The purpose of this talk is to showcase the most common vulnerabilities that are due to specificities and pitfalls of the actual Solidity language. This would be generally the results of a research study made on the language vulnerabilities found in audits (Solodit-based) and post audits (hacks and Immunefi report database). Some great language design decisions from a security perspective could also be presented.
